page.title: 17Joanna's house.
page.content:
Joanna is a pupil at the local school, who lives in one of the better houses in the area. Another pupil writes:
In Joanna's house you can see the stairs. She has a big garden and a stable. She used to have a horse - it was white. Joanna has a brother and a sister.
When I went to Joanna's birthday party a long time ago, it was different to now because she used to have a door in the room and you used to go through it and there were a lot of seats just like you have on a picnic.
There are a lot of bedrooms in the house and the bathroom is ever so nice and big. Joanna's mum is a teacher at our school.
